timeline.bodyText:
Please use the existing PreferencesService class, it is already a wrapper/it extends the JabRefPreferences class.
Just add a method there for getting the preferences key

replies.author: Gena928

replies.bodyText:
Hi,
even easier, no need for a GroupPreferences

Add a method like getDisplayGroupCount() to the PreferencesService Interface
Add the same method to JabRefPreferences (override annoation) and  simply return
return getBoolean(JabRefPreferences.DISPLAY_GROUP_COUNT)
In GroupTreeView you call preferencesService.getDisplayGroupCount()

I think renaming quantity to Count fit's better
